Player History
Released by New Jersey on 1/31/1981...
Signed as a free agent by Toledo on 2/1/1981 to a 3-year deal worth $1,250,000 per year...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/13/1981, off Manuel Cortes (WIS)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/16/1981, off George Popovich (NJ)...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Plum Grove on 9/7/1983...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Bay City on 7/9/1986...
Signed as a free agent by Syracuse on 2/2/1987 to a 3-year deal worth $1,310,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 2/20/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $1,350,000 per year...
Had 5 hits with 8 RBI against Columbus on 8/5/1990...
Injured on 4/30/1992 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 3/1/1993 to a minor league contract.
